issue: Fish shell not set as default

steps.description: Investigation into Fish shell not being set as default is ongoing.
hypotheses: The Fish shell is installed but not set as the default shell for the container.
The Dockerfile may have commands that are not executed properly to set Fish as the default shell.

changes.description: Updated the Dockerfile to set Fish as the default shell for the vscode user.
changes.reason: The previous configuration did not persist the default shell setting for the vscode user.

issue: NVIDIA GPU support in Docker container

steps.description: Confirmed nvidia-smi command is present and CUDA is working properly within the container.

gitCommits.message: Create the `.aider.notes.json` file with the initial structure for tracking NVIDIA GPU support in the Docker container.
Updated .aider.notes.json to reflect the progress of NVIDIA GPU support in Docker container.
Remove NVIDIA GPU support entry and add new problem about Fish shell not being set as default.
